一些国家经济社会发展进入转型期，内部矛盾趋于上升。: The economic and social development of some countries has entered a period of transformation, and internal conflicts tend to rise.
一些国家处于经济社会转型期，政局持续动荡。: Some countries are in a period of economic and social transition, and their political situation continues to be turbulent.
一些国家越来越富裕，另一些国家长期贫穷落后，这样的局面是不可持续的。: Some countries are getting richer and richer, while others remain poor and backward for a long time. This situation is unsustainable.
一些园区开发企业走出园区，区外圈地走的还是房地产开发运营的路线。: Some park development companies have gone out of the park and are still pursuing the route of real estate development and operation outside the park.
一些土地开发的遗留问题正在解决。: Some land development legacy issues are being addressed.
一些在职白领为了给自己创造更多的晋升机会，纷纷利用课余时间进修中文。: In order to create more promotion opportunities for themselves, some working white-collar workers are using their spare time to learn Chinese.
一些地区动荡和局部冲突尚未解决。: Unrest and local conflicts in some regions have not yet been resolved.
一些地区大气、水、土壤等污染严重，节能减排任务艰巨。: In some areas, air, water, soil and other pollution are serious, and the task of energy conservation and emission reduction is arduous.
一些地区性高端餐饮商户纷纷停业，全国连锁高端餐饮品牌则大多选择关店止血。: Some regional high-end catering merchants have closed down, and most national chain high-end catering brands have chosen to close their stores to stop the bleeding.
一些地区结合生态移民，鼓励引导牧民外出务工经商，有效拓宽了牧民增收途径。: In some areas, combined with ecological migration, herders are encouraged and guided to go out for work and business, effectively broadening the ways for herders to increase their income.
一些地区通过规划环评，优化了产业结构和空间布局，提升了发展质量。: Through planning environmental assessment, some regions have optimized the industrial structure and spatial layout and improved the quality of development.
一些地方上有政策下有对策，或者打擦边球，绕过国家规划盲目扩张。: In some places, there are policies and countermeasures, or they are skirting around the national plan and expanding blindly.
一些地方也采取相应措施，引导和支援合作社在社区开展直供直销。: Some places have also taken corresponding measures to guide and support cooperatives to carry out direct supply and direct sales in communities.
一些地方传统和稀有品种资源丧失。: Some local traditional and rare species resources have been lost.
一些地方出现招工难、人工成本上升的现象，便是这种成效的有力证明。: The difficulty in recruiting workers and rising labor costs in some places is a strong proof of this effectiveness.
一些地方受土地、经费等条件的限制，派出所可以与其他建筑合建。: In some places, due to land and funding constraints, police stations can be built jointly with other buildings.
一些地方和部门还存在违法违规、失信于民、政令不畅、执行不力等突出问题。: Some places and departments still have prominent problems such as violations of laws and regulations, breach of trust by the people, poor government orders, and poor implementation.
一些地方和部门还难以给出令人满意的答案。: It is still difficult for some places and departments to give satisfactory answers.
一些地方在动拆迁时，动用大批警力，甚至引发群体性事件。: In some places, a large number of police forces were used during demolition, which even caused mass incidents.
一些地方对加快城镇化进程的改革措施落实不够，改革还停留在一般口号上。: In some places, reform measures to speed up the urbanization process have not been implemented enough, and the reforms remain just general slogans.
一些地方，尤其是基层文化人才队伍建设不到位，人员配置不够，文化人才缺乏。: In some places, especially at the grassroots level, the construction of cultural talent teams is not in place, staffing is insufficient, and there is a shortage of cultural talents.
一些地方征地补偿安置落实不到位、侵害被征地农民合法权益等问题依然严重。: Problems such as insufficient implementation of land acquisition compensation and resettlement in some places and infringement of the legitimate rights and interests of land-expropriated farmers are still serious.
一些地方担心影响发展，不愿意建立自然保护区。: Some places are unwilling to establish nature reserves for fear of affecting development.
一些地方政府基于招商引资的现实需要，往往对其行贿视而不见。: Some local governments often turn a blind eye to bribery based on the practical needs of attracting investment.
一些地方政府部门，甚至由于官场环境和人事的变化，而不敢作为。: Some local government departments even dare not take action due to changes in the official environment and personnel.
一些地方政府虽然制定了许多优惠政策，但政策不落实。: Although some local governments have formulated many preferential policies, they are not implemented.
一些地方民警流失现象比较严重。: The loss of police officers is serious in some places.
一些地方片面追求城市规模，忽视功能的完善和品位的提高。: Some places pursue urban scale one-sidedly and ignore the improvement of functions and taste.
一些地方特色政策加分项目，也在此轮调整中被取消。: Some bonus points for local characteristic policies have also been canceled in this round of adjustments.
一些地方认为，在国有企业中引入社会资本，混合所有制就大功告成了。: Some places believe that by introducing social capital into state-owned enterprises, mixed ownership will be complete.
一些地方财政的账上停留着多年不动的「沉睡资金」。: Some local governments have “sleeping funds” that have remained unmoved for many years in their financial accounts.
一些地方农业和水利部门等，正在向农业部、水利部紧急上报排查摸底情况。: Some local agriculture and water conservancy departments are urgently reporting the situation to the Ministry of Agriculture and the Ministry of Water Resources for investigation.
一些地方通过发展加工贸易，实现了就业增长、财政增收、农民脱贫致富。: Through the development of processing trade, some places have achieved employment growth, increased fiscal revenue, and farmers have been lifted out of poverty and become rich.
一些地理信息分析软件做得非常不错。: Some geographic information analysis software does a very good job.
一些城投平台对地产等单行业依赖性很大，经营波动风险高。: Some urban investment platforms are highly dependent on single industries such as real estate and have high risks of operational fluctuations.
一些城里人对待农民工也是「二元态度」。: Some urbanites also have a "dualistic attitude" towards migrant workers.
一些报纸的总编辑也反映要对摄影加以重视。: The editor-in-chief of some newspapers also expressed the need to pay more attention to photography.
一些报道说，公车改革会给一些贫困地区的财政带来很大压力。: Some reports say that bus reform will put great pressure on the finances of some poor areas.
一些外商提出的「关于暂免深加工转型的外资企业增值税」等问题得到合理解决。: Issues raised by some foreign businessmen such as "About the temporary exemption of value-added tax for foreign-invested enterprises undergoing deep processing transformation" have been reasonably resolved.
一些外国公司已成功立足中国市场，但另一些公司却发现业务停滞不前。: Some foreign companies have successfully established themselves in the Chinese market, but others have found their business stagnant.
一些外地新闻媒体也闻讯赶来积极宣传长征精神。: Some foreign news media also heard the news and came to actively promote the spirit of the Long March.
一些外籍人士在接受采访时，受访者普遍的疑问是：中国内地的普通人怎么活？: When some foreigners were interviewed, the common question asked by the interviewees was: How do ordinary people in mainland China live?
一些大型企业拥有自己的具有先进水平的研究开发中心，有着强大的技术实力。: Some large enterprises have their own advanced research and development centers with strong technical strength.
一些大型国企独立董事的引入并未或尚未产生设定中的效果。: The introduction of independent directors of some large state-owned enterprises has not or has not yet produced the intended effect.
一些「委员信箱」还在招商引资中发挥了促进作用。: Some "committee mailboxes" also play a role in promoting investment.
一些妇女在遭受家庭暴力以后，有满腔的委屈，她们不仅要倾诉而且要求评理。: Some women are filled with grievances after suffering domestic violence. They not only want to talk about it but also ask for comment.
一些学生家长质疑，学校收这么多钱究竟干啥去了？: Some parents of students question what the school does with collecting so much money.
一些实力较为雄厚的报业集团近年来资本运作发展迅猛。: Some relatively strong newspaper groups have experienced rapid development in capital operations in recent years.
一些专家也表示需要更多的经济刺激政策。: Some experts also say more economic stimulus policies are needed.
一些专家和学者说，多彩贵州街是向国际水平迈进的探索。: Some experts and scholars say that Colorful Guizhou Street is an exploration towards international standards.
一些专家学者高度评价人民网《地方领导留言板》。: Some experts and scholars spoke highly of People's Daily Online's "Local Leaders Message Board".
一些专家建议，可将公益金过渡为博彩税，财政统筹专用避免截留。: Some experts suggest that public welfare funds can be transitioned into gambling taxes and used exclusively for financial planning to avoid interception.
一些专家指出，我国乡镇由于「老债」存在的时间长的达十多年甚至更长时间。: Some experts point out that my country's towns and villages have existed for more than ten years or even longer due to "old debt."
一些小党没有跨过门槛，要提十个。: Some small parties have not crossed the threshold and want to mention ten.
一些小微企业融资难，这是不争的事实。: It is an indisputable fact that some small and micro enterprises have difficulty in financing.
一些工作走在了全国前列，创造了不少好经验、好做法。: Some work is at the forefront of the country and has created a lot of good experiences and practices.
一些工业较强的垦区如北京、黑龙江和新疆兵团等工业利润下降幅度较大。: Some industrially strong reclamation areas, such as Beijing, Heilongjiang and Xinjiang Corps, have seen larger declines in industrial profits.
一些市民在问：人大代表、政协委员究竟是为人民服务还是在扰民？: Some citizens are asking: Are NPC deputies and CPPCC members serving the people or disturbing them?
一些干部在廉政上出问题，很重要的原因就是党纪观念不强，法纪政纪修养不够。: A very important reason why some cadres have problems with integrity is that they have a weak sense of party discipline and insufficient cultivation of legal and political disciplines.
一些微企尽管现在很弱小，但有很好的成长性。: Although some micro-enterprises are currently very weak, they have good potential for growth.
一些微观经济领域管得过多，而社会管理和公共服务职能又没有充分发挥。: Some microeconomic areas are overregulated, while social management and public service functions are not fully utilized.
一些急需资金的欧洲国家纷纷加入争夺中国富人的行列，移民门槛一降再降。: Some European countries that are in urgent need of funds have joined the ranks of competing for wealthy Chinese, and the immigration threshold has been lowered again and again.
一些成员希望中国进一步加大知识产权的执法力度。: Some members hope that China will further strengthen the enforcement of intellectual property rights.
一些所谓中国搞新殖民主义的论调是别有用心的，对此应该保持清醒的认识。: Some claims that China engages in neo-colonialism have ulterior motives, and we should keep a clear understanding of this.
一些承办单位对承诺改进事项及时跟踪督办，着力推动办理落实。: Some undertaking units promptly tracked and supervised the implementation of promised improvement matters, and made efforts to promote their implementation.
一些投资者表示担忧，并向公司索要本金。: Some investors expressed concern and demanded principal from the company.
一些拉丁美洲国家欠了那么多外债，那条路我们是能走的。: Some Latin American countries owe so much foreign debt, so we can take that path.
一些摇摆不定的投资者信心发生了动摇。: Some wavering investor confidence has been shaken.
一些政府承认残疾人享有平等出入建筑环境的基本权利。: Some governments recognize the fundamental right of persons with disabilities to equal access to the built environment.
一些敌对势力从没有忘记从否定党的历史，达到否定党执政地位的目的。: Some hostile forces have never forgotten to deny the party's history and achieve the goal of denying the party's ruling status.
一些文艺界的重要人物被触及，他们的一些作品遭到了否定。: Some important figures in the literary and artistic circles were touched, and some of their works were rejected.
一些新的不规范行为没有相应的罚则，难以有效规范现行医疗服务行为。: Some new irregularities do not have corresponding penalties, making it difficult to effectively regulate current medical service practices.
一些新的观念已开始扎根在新闻工作者头脑中。: Some new concepts have begun to take root in the minds of journalists.
一些新落户的企业办一个土地使用证，将近半年没有批复。: Some newly settled enterprises have applied for a land use certificate, but have not received approval for nearly half a year.
一些方案已报到国务院改革办，讨论通过后将报由中央深改办讨论。: Some plans have been reported to the Reform Office of the State Council. After discussion and approval, they will be reported to the Central Deep Reform Office for discussion.
一些旅游新增长极也在小长假凸现。: Some new tourism growth poles also emerged during the short holiday.
一些有影响的报刊纷纷发表文章，要求坚持四项基本原则，反对资产阶级自由化。: Some influential newspapers and periodicals published articles calling for the adherence to the Four Basic Principles and opposition to bourgeois liberalization.
一些有识之士建议，中国民航当务之急是扭亏增盈。: Some knowledgeable people suggest that the top priority for China’s civil aviation industry is to turn around losses and increase profits.
一些「东突」组织公开宣扬要通过恐怖暴力手段达到分裂目的。: Some "East Turkistan" organizations openly advocate the use of terror and violence to achieve separatist goals.
一些核和放射性材料在工业、农业和医药等方面的应用，难以为其它材料所替代。: Some nuclear and radioactive materials have applications in industry, agriculture, medicine, etc., and are difficult to be replaced by other materials.
一些案例中，专案甚至可以提供数十个就业机会。: In some cases, projects can even provide dozens of job opportunities.
一些业内人士正是据此认为出版已经是「夕阳产业」。: Based on this, some people in the industry believe that publishing has become a "sunset industry."
一些业内人士透露，这标志着审计结果虽未对外公布，但整改问责已经启动。: Some industry insiders revealed that this indicates that although the audit results have not been announced to the outside world, rectification and accountability have begun.
一些业内人士预计，2013年全年票房或将超过220亿元。: Some industry insiders predict that the box office for 2013 may exceed 22 billion yuan.
一些业界敏感人士已经捕捉到了威胁来临的信号。: Some sensitive people in the industry have caught the signs of the approaching threat.
一些欧盟国家领导人敦促英国政府「接受现实」。: Some EU leaders urged the British government to "accept reality".
一些欧美国家也非常注重失业率数据。: Some European and American countries also pay great attention to unemployment data.
一些正直的、友好的外国人士为此而替我们担心。: Some honest and friendly foreigners are worried about us.
一些比较大的传统企业可能会沉默或者以其他方式去应对一些突发事件。: Some larger traditional companies may remain silent or respond to emergencies in other ways.
一些民营中小企业产品科技含量较低，自主创新能力弱，缺乏核心竞争力。: The products of some private small and medium-sized enterprises have low technological content, weak independent innovation capabilities, and lack core competitiveness.
一些民营企业、中小企业未执行带薪年休假制度。: Some private enterprises and small and medium-sized enterprises do not implement the paid annual leave system.
一些海外地接社团增加景点和购物，居然还设置了去「赌城」的项目。: Some overseas tour groups have added attractions and shopping, and even set up a project to go to "Gambling City".
一些消失多年的珍稀动物，又开始重返家园。: Some rare animals that have disappeared for many years are returning to their homes.
一些港报起了「小通讯社」的作用。: Some Hong Kong newspapers have played the role of "small news agencies".
一些游客惊恐避开，也有人与之对骂。: Some tourists were frightened and avoided it, while others quarreled with them.
一些物种不适应生境的变化，种群数量日益减少。: Some species cannot adapt to changes in habitat, and their populations are declining.
一些理财产品不用买的，就在网上银行点击开通就可以了。: You don’t need to buy some financial products, just click to activate them in online banking.

一些省份已经出台了不动产统一登记工作方案，明确了工作时间表。: Some provinces have introduced work plans for unified real estate registration and clarified the work schedule.
一些省份没钱又没人，就用老运动员。: Some provinces have no money and no one, so they use old athletes.
一些省（市）的办结率和答复率均在80%以上。: The completion rate and response rate in some provinces (cities) are above 80%.
一些省级政府也相继建立了生物多样性保护的协调机制。: Some provincial governments have also established coordination mechanisms for biodiversity protection.
一些知名艺术家的作品也放进去，放的位置也很不讲究。: Works by some well-known artists are also put in, and the placement is not particular.
一些知情人士在表达惋惜的同时，坦言原行长堪称「能人」。: While expressing regret, some people familiar with the matter admitted that the former president was a "capable person."
不要认为马克思主义就消失了，没用了，失败了。: Don’t think that Marxism has disappeared, is useless, or has failed.
一些社会主义国家的教训说明了这一点。: The lessons of some socialist countries illustrate this point.
一些科技界专家建议，政府应侧重市场环境的监管，从体制上提供保障。: Some experts in the scientific and technological field suggest that the government should focus on the supervision of the market environment and provide institutional protection.
一些简单的，我们认为可以直接由当地解决的，我们也会直接给您回复。: For some simple questions that we think can be solved directly by the local people, we will also reply to you directly.
一些精于此道者当作其致富的资本。: Some people who are good at this regard it as their capital to become rich.
一些精明的农户看到外地人常来村里取茶经，利用新房开设了乡村宾馆等等。: Some smart farmers saw that outsiders often came to the village to obtain tea scriptures, and used their new houses to open rural hotels and so on.
一些「纯电视购物」的所谓金银收藏品，95%以上都是假货。: More than 95% of the so-called gold and silver collectibles sold in "pure TV shopping" are fake.
一些纸媒已经深刻地认识到，区域对于报纸应对新媒体竞争的重要性。: Some print media have deeply realized the importance of region for newspapers to cope with new media competition.
一些经济不发达的地区在该领域投入过少，甚至无法起到应有的引导作用。: Some economically underdeveloped regions have invested too little in this field and cannot even play the guiding role they deserve.
一些经济学家对「预期增速下调」的判断有了存在余地。: Some economists have room for judgment on the "reduction in expected growth rate."
一些经济发达城市正在努力培育发展科技服务业。: Some economically developed cities are working hard to cultivate and develop technological service industries.

一些职能部门闻风后，只顾局部利益，置全局利益而不顾，开口就要罚款几万。: After hearing the news, some functional departments only cared about local interests and ignored the overall interests, and fined them tens of thousands for opening their mouths.
一些能人巧匠，借社区文化活动的东风，开展得有声有色，闻名一方。: Some talented people and craftsmen have taken advantage of community cultural activities to develop them vigorously and become famous.

一些行业凭借垄断地位轻易获得高额利润，并将其转化为员工的收入和福利。: Some industries rely on their monopoly status to easily obtain high profits and convert them into employees' income and benefits.
